description: Try our easy to follow Choc Dipped Cherries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate-covered fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Choc Dipped Cherries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and dry 1kg fresh cherries with stems.
Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Place 200g chocolate melts (white, milk or dark â€“ or a mix) in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water and stir until smooth. Hold cherries by the stem and dip into the melted chocolate (about halfway).
Let any excess chocolate drip back into the bowl. Stand cherries on the tray. Refrigerate for 5 minutes until set. Note: Melt chocolate over simmering hot water.
